CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 2, 1945, pg. 8, reads: "Student Aid Committee Gathers - A fine group of public-spirited citizens met Monday night at Kay Boys Club to assist in working out plans for the mammoth card party to be given June 14 at the YMHA, to benefit the Student Aid Committee of the Urban League....Center: Mrs. Cornelius D. Scully, wife of the Mayor, is shown with a group of workers, including Mrs. Jayne McDaniels, Vivian Davidson, Daisy Goodman, Mrs. U.S. Williams and Mrs. Bessie Watkins... - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Cornelius D. Scully standing center, surrounded by Jayne McDaniels, Vivian Davidson (Hewitt), Daisy Goodman, Mrs. U. S. Williams, and Bessie Watkins, in Kay Boys Club
